attributes.action: Consider installation of speed ramps in Suton, Wymondham, Norfolk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Suton is a rural village with made up of around 40 properties. The roads leading to Suton are the A11 with a 70mph speed limit and others with a 50mph limit. Our lanes do not have any speed limit signs and do not have any speed restriction ramps. We constantly have vehicles pass by at excessive speeds and it is only a matter of time before we witness a serious accident. Our lanes are unpaved and we consider them unsafe at times so respectfully request the the PM may consider our situation and act before there is a fatality.
